Delegates calls of IChangeable methods to the given slave. More...

Detailed Description

Delegates calls of IChangeable methods to the given slave.

istd::IPolymorphic *  changeParamsPtr = NULL

Starts the change transaction.

Note:
Please note that the changeFlags and changeParamsPtr must not be identical with the corresponded parameters in EndChanges().

istd::IChangeable * istd::CChangeDelegator::GetSlavePtr ( ) const [inline, virtual]

Sets the slave object pointer.

Its IChangeable methods will be called, if this object is updated.
